billOfLadingNumber.title: Bill Of Lading Number
billOfLadingNumber.description: This identifier might not be globally unique.

bookingNumber.title: Booking Number
bookingNumber.description: Reference number assigned by a carrier of its agent to identify a specific consignment such as a booking reference number when cargo space is reserved prior to loading.

relatedDocuments.title: Purchase
relatedDocuments.description: Purchase documents related to a bill of lading

scac.title: SCAC
scac.description: For maritime shipments, this code qualifies a Standard Alpha Carrier Code (SCAC) as issued by the United Stated National Motor Traffic Association Inc.

carrier.title: Carrier
carrier.description: The party providing the transport of goods in this consignment between named points.

consignor.title: Consignor
consignor.description: The party consigning goods, as stipulated in the transport contract by the party ordering transport.

consignee.title: Consignee
consignee.description: A party to which goods are consigned.

notify.title: Notify Party
notify.description: The party to be notified upon arrival of goods and when special occurrences (usually pre-defined) take place during a transportation service.

freightForwarder.title: Freight Forwarder
freightForwarder.description: The party combining individual smaller consignments into a single larger shipment (the consolidated shipment), which is sent to a counterpart that mirrors the consolidator's activity by dividing the consolidated consignment into its original components.

freight.title: Freight
freight.description: Content described by the bill of lading

nmfcFreightClass.title: NMFC Freight Class
nmfcFreightClass.description: The National Motor Freight Classification® (NMFC®) is a standard that allows for determining of freight classes for the comparison of different commodities and products being shipped.

hazardCode.title: Hazard Code
hazardCode.description: The Department of Transportation (DOT) hazard code associated with the shipment.

firstArrivalPortLocation.title: First Arrival Port
firstArrivalPortLocation.description: The first arrival location in a transport. This would be a port for sea, an airport for air, a terminal for rail, or a border post for land crossing.

lastExitPortLocation.title: Last Exit Port
lastExitPortLocation.description: The final exporting location in a transport. This would be a port for sea, an airport for air, a terminal for rail, or a border post for land crossing.
